<h1>FAQ</h1>

## Do I need to know JavaScript?

No.

## Is this to learn JavaScript?

No. 

## But we are going to write a lot of JavaScript?

No, on the contrary, as little as possible.

## What level of R programming is required?

You need to be familiar with the language and its data structures, some experience in package development and JSON goes a long way but is not necessary.

## How long is the workshop?

Roughly 3 hours of fun!
